anime.description: * A CM produced at http://anidb.net/cr736 [Kyoto Animation].

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

tag.name: commercial
tag.description: This title is used to sell and/or promote a real-life product or service. Not to be confused with "product placement" or "subliminal advertising" — this features *direct* promotion for such element. Depending on the setting, some could even be considered as "animated infomercials".

tag.name: black and white
tag.description: Some or all of this anime is in black and white, typical of older anime made before ~1960. Some modern anime may intentionally shift to black and white for certain scenes or episodes as an artistic effect.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.
